member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBee
member.summary: A XBee module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBee.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.
member.remarks:
The function can be called to configure the before it is used. If it is not called before first use, then the following defaults will be used and cannot be changed afterwards:
Baud Rate - 115200
Parity - SerialParity.None
Stop Bits - SerialStopBits.One
Data Bits - 8

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBee.Configure(System.Int32,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.Serial.SerialParity,Gadgeteer.Interfaces.Serial.SerialStopBits,System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures this serial line. This should be called at most once.
member.param: A value from the enumeration that specifies the parity.
A value from the enumeration that specifies the number of stop bits.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBee.SerialLine
member.summary: Gets the device associated with this instance.
